issue.title: N4086, N3981 Removing trigraphs??!, N4210 IBM comment on preparing for a Trigraph-adverse future in C++17

resolution.p: The paper contains the proposed wording.

discussion.p: Discussed in Rapperswil 2014. IBM continues to oppose.
5/16/6. Removal is still by far the strongest.
The proposal goes forward to CWG. CWG has already reviewed it and designated it ready for voting in Urbana.
Adopted into the working draft in Urbana, as N4086.
